repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary on Gṛhyaratna .

msItem.title: Kantabhūṣaṇa

filiation.p: VOHD II,6 p: 751 entry number 2127 . New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 06 p: 106

msItem.incipit: 1v1 prayogacandrikāyāṃ strīṇāṃ jātakarmādica?lāntān sāmskārān ārādhyaṃgasahitān homavarjītān mantrakaṃ kuryāt saptamādyayugmemāsya 1v1 ntaprāśanaṃ gṛharaktecajātakarmādyāssaṃskārā tāścālāntāstrīṇā karmakālaśāvakuṣṇiṃ kāryāḥ . kuṣṇimetāḥ śriyaṃ strīṇāṃ vivāhastu samantrakaḥ ityuktaṃ .
msItem.explicit: 112v 1 tasmāt kriyāparāḥ . upavitamidandadhyuritarenāyīkāriṇaḥ . evanniṣekayā uktā ssaṃskārāste punaḥ yañjopavi 112v2 tīnaiva kata ssphalā iti jñāpayituṃ yañjopavītavidhīruktaḥ . idāniṃ prakṛtamupasṃharan śaṃkhavacanamudāharati .112v 3 saṃskārairiti .. ekaviṃśatiḥ . khaṇḍaḥ . ghṛhyaratnasya parigrāhyatve hetumāha .. gṛhyāntaroktārtha 112v 4 viśeṣamāpastaṃbhāśrayaṃ vaidikasārvabhaumam . bhahaspatirvikṣya brigu?? h̬icekadatta? kalpa .. santaḥ 112v 5 iti hārtakulatilakasya sasvativallabhācāryapautrasya śrīraṃganāthasurisutasya śrīveṃkaṭeśasya vaidi112v 6 kasārvabhaumasya kṛtiṣu guhyaratnavyākhyānṭ karṇabhuṣaṇe saptamaḥ paṭalaḥ .. yādṛśaṃ pustakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ ma 112v 7 yā . abaddhaṃ vā subaddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na vidyate . kṣantaumarhanti samīkṣyasajjanam . hariḥ oṃ śrīmatelakṣmīnṛsiṃhā 112v 8 yanamaḥ ..

support.p: Palm leaf is used as guard cover.

extent.measure: 5 blank folio 2 guard folio and 112 written

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin.

handNote.desc: good clean and big letters but some places not legible due to unclear shape.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.
